sentences.english: The ethnography of communication refers to the study of the individual's communicative ability in the social setting.
sentences.chinese: 交際民俗學研究個人在社會環境中的交際能力。

sentences.english: This article makes an explanation of folklore on its special role.
sentences.chinese: 本文就其特殊角色進行了民俗學解讀。

sentences.english: Folklorists have classified fairy tales in various ways.
sentences.chinese: 民俗學家以不同的方式對童話進行了分類。

sentences.english: Its taking shape possesses profound folklore origins and ideological basis.
sentences.chinese: 它的形成具有深遠的民俗學淵源和思想基礎。

sentences.english: In Chapter One, the signification in folklore of Mid-autumn Day and flourish of the festival in Song Dynasty were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第一章探討中秋節的民俗學意義及其在宋代的繁榮。

sentences.english: Fieldwork is the basic knowledge of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 民俗學的知識基礎是田野作業。

sentences.english: I am in favor of the Chung on China's views on the onset of modern folklore.
sentences.chinese: 我很贊成鍾先生關於中國現代民俗學的肇始的見解。

sentences.english: The essay aims to tackle the inner mechanism of Xu's novels from the point view of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 本文從民俗學角度闡釋媽祖文化對許地山創作的影響。

sentences.english: Folklorists have come up with a number of definitions for urban legend.
sentences.chinese: 民俗學家們曾對都市傳奇下過多個定義。

sentences.english: This paper tries to interpret this excellent movie from the angle of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 文章選擇從民俗學的角度解讀這部優秀的影視作品。

sentences.english: Medical folklore is one of important contents of the folklore study.
sentences.chinese: 醫藥民俗是民俗學研究的重要內容之一。

definition: Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
lit. enough books to make a pack-ox sweat or to fill a house to the rafters (idiom); fig. many books
